title: Vissi d'arte
text: "Vissi d'arte" is a <a href="soprano">soprano</a> <a href="aria">aria</a> from act 2 of the <a href="opera">opera</a> "<a href="Tosca">Tosca</a>" by <a href="Giacomo%20Puccini">Giacomo Puccini</a>. It is sung by Floria Tosca as she thinks of her fate, how the life of her beloved, Mario Cavaradossi, is at the mercy of Baron Scarpia and why God has seemingly abandoned her. The vocal range is E<a href="Scientific%20pitch%20notation">4</a> to B5.
